name: WhitespaceAssembler
notes:
<number> is a number literal or the value of a variable (formats: <int>, #<hex>, '<char>', and &<variable>).
<address> is the value on the heap at the variable value (format: *<variable>), i.e. `push <variable> retrieve`.
<int> is a base 10 integer, i.e. /[+-]?[0-9]+/.
<hex> is a base 16 integer, i.e. /[0-9A-Fa-f]+/.
<char> is one UTF-16 character, escape sequences aren't supported.
<label> and <variable> values increment (with separate counters), starting at 0.
